title: Hypervideo-Based Language Learning Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic digital literacy and fundamental language skills
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of real-time interaction and self-directed learning activities in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can use hypervideo tools to create personal notes on language learning content
Learners engage in collaborative learning activities based on feedback from peers and instructors through real-time sessions
Learners structure and reflect on learning content using public/private annotation features
Learners apply acquired language skills to real-world work scenarios through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
